page.title: 15LOCAL EVENTS,SEAMILL
page.content: {School Sports Day The school sports day is held every year in the{Kirktonhall Glen,}in June.There are a variety of races and activities ranging from flat races to obstacle races. There are four school teams:{Overton, Hunterston, Crosbie and{Ardneil.}These are named after local areas. { B.B.Fete The B.B. Fete is similar to Gala Week except that all the funds collected go towards B.B. funds. This helps them to buy things for their club. Sometimes they give the money to charity. { Gala Week This takes place in June every year. It is one of the busiest weeks of the year. The people of Seamill and West Kilbride pick a local girl to become their Gala Queen. Various activities arranged include discos, bonfires, etc
